post.text: We don't have time to play games anymore! Enough! It is time to MAKE AMERICA SAFE & GREAT AGAIN -- IMMEDIATELY! -DJT

comment.author: Chelsey
comment.text: Chelsey Kaine voted to steal retirees pension benefits. He voted to cut them by 40%-70%. HR-83, Multiemployer Pension Reform Act of 2014. This bill was pass without debate and pushed through on a eve of a Government shutdown...

replies.author: Thomas
replies.text: Thank you and Our senior citizens didn't get Annual cost if living raises
